statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_reporting;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT accessed_database FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT activity_type FROM user_activity_reporting ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, accessed_database FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE accessed_database = 'customer_info' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, accessed_database FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout')
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_reporting WHERE accessed_database LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity_reporting GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_activity_reports;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_activity_reports ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, user_id FROM user_activity_reports WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity_reports WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_activity_reports GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_reports WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_activity_reports WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level, timestamp FROM financial_access_reports WHERE access_level = 'Admin' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM financial_access_reports GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity_reports GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT database_name, access_timestamp FROM financial_access WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC
SELECT report_name, report_timestamp FROM audit_reports WHERE report_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'logout' ORDER BY activity_timestamp
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM financial_access fa INNER JOIN user_activity ua ON fa.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE fa.access_timestamp > '2022-01-01'

SELECT fa.database_name, ua.activity_type, ar.report_name FROM financial_access fa LEFT JOIN user_activity ua ON fa.user_id = ua.user_id LEFT JOIN audit_reports ar ON fa.access_timestamp = ar.report_timestamp
SELECT * FROM user_activity UNION SELECT * FROM financial_access ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC, access_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_log WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_date) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT database_name, location FROM financial_databases WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT database_name, location FROM financial_databases WHERE database_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, database_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC;
